statement.p: Find a basis for the subspace of \mathcal{P}^3 W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{8 \, x^{3} + 12 \, x^{2} - 2 \, x + 8 , -4 \, x^{2} - 2 \, x - 4 , -16 \, x^{3} - 28 \, x^{2} + 2 \, x - 20 , -4 \, x^{3} - 2 \, x^{2} + 3 \, x , -4 \, x^{3} + x^{2} - 5 \, x + 1\right\}. Be sure to explain why your result is a basis.
